group.title: iO
group.description: Style properties for the iO theme

property.title: Block filter bar
property.description: When the content of a block can be filtered, the controls to do so are styled here

property.title: Button base
property.description: Defines the styling for the basic elements that are common to all text-based buttons

property.title: Button - call to action
property.description: Call to action buttons sit alone and invite the user to do something, like post a new thread

property.title: Button - primary
property.description: These rules are used mostly for the main submit button for forms

property.title: Body Text Font
property.description: This font is used for the text of messages etc.
property.value: "-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', 'Oxygen', 'Ubuntu', 'Cantarell', 'Fira Sans', 'Droid Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif"

property.title: User Interface Font
property.description: The font list for your main text
property.value: "-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', 'Oxygen', 'Ubuntu', 'Cantarell', 'Fira Sans', 'Droid Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif"

property.title: Form input
property.description: Controls the style of most text-input boxes

property.title: Enable smart node gradients
property.description: Generates node colors based on the primary brand color

property.title: Member profile header
property.description: The member profile page's content header is styled with these settings

property.title: Menu
property.description: Controls the main block of all popup menus

property.title: Message padding
property.description: When using the full-size message block, this value defines the size of the padding around the message text

property.title: Message padding small
property.description: This value controls the padding around the message text when using the small message block

property.title: Message user info block
property.description: Apart from its width, the (left) message user info column is styled here

property.title: Footer links
property.description: Controls styling for individual links within the footer

property.title: List of additional css templates to include
property.description: A comma separated list of additional CSS/less templates to load. Requires the .css or .less suffix

property.title: Logo breakpoint
property.description: Max viewport width to switch to the brandmark image. Use 100% for always, 0 for never, and other values in pixels

property.title: Category icon style
property.description: Styles the category strip icon if applicable

property.title: Category Strip
property.description: Styles the category strip for nodes

property.title: Move category strip outside wrapper
property.description: Moves the category strip outside of the level 1 node container

property.title: Clickable threads
property.description: Makes the entire thread list item clickable

property.title: Discussion list animation
property.description: Adds animation to discussion list items on page load

property.title: Width to collapse discussion list items
Elevation 1
property.description: Sets the box-shadow value for elevation level 1

property.title: Elevation 2
property.description: Sets the box shadow value for elevation level 2

property.title: Extended Footer White Text
property.description: Checking this option will add CSS to make all text white for legibility. Only use this Style Property if you have a dark background that is causing legibility issues. (Most often useful for a dark footer on a light theme.)

property.title: Page action as floating action button
property.description: Adds the page action as a floating action button

property.title: Footer chooser
property.description: Styles the footer chooser (ex. style chooser, width toggle, language chooser)

property.title: Footer menu
property.description: Styles the footer menu bar

property.title: Footer widget header
property.description: Styles the minor heading block is footer widgets

property.title: Google Fonts
property.description: Choose the fonts in which to load from Google Fonts API.

property.title: Header wrapper
property.description: Styles the wrapper around the entire header

property.title: Secondary font
property.description: Font family used for headings and other decorative text situations.
property.value: "-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', 'Oxygen', 'Ubuntu', 'Cantarell', 'Fira Sans', 'Droid Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif"

property.title: Image path
property.description: Sets the path to images for the theme.

property.title: Logo text
property.description: Adds text in place of a logo. Note: this is overwritten when a logo image path is set

property.title: Message
property.description: Styles the message container

property.title: Message action bar
property.description: Styles the action bar for messages

property.title: Message animation
property.description: Adds an animation to messages on page load

property.title: Message control
property.description: Styles the message actions such as reply and report

property.title: Message like bar
property.description: Styles the "Likes" bar for messages

property.title: Navigation logo vertical spacing
property.description: The max height of the navigation logo is the height of the navigation bar minus these spacings, however it may be smaller when there is not enough horizontal width.

property.title: Navigation bar height
property.description: Sets the height of the primary navigation bar. (Note: this gets overwritten by sticky nav bar height when applicable. If unset, the navigation bar height will simply be as large as the largest component inside of it.)

property.title: Node body
property.description: Styles the individual node body

property.title: Node body (hover)
property.description: Adds a hover state to nodes

property.title: Clickable nodes
property.description: Makes the entire node a clickable link to the forum. (Ignores other inner links.)

property.title: Page animations
property.description: Adds animations to main components (header, sidebars, main content, footer) on page load

property.title: Remove Title from Forum Index
property.description: Removes the page title from the forum index. Note: Only applicable when there are no other components in titlebar (such as page action or sidebar toggle.)

property.title: Remove forum list page actions
property.description: Removes the page actions from the forum list. By default these are New Posts and Post New Thread.

property.title: Viewport Width to Show Search Icon
property.description: Enter the maximum viewport width at which the search icon replaces the search bar.

property.title: Separate Sticky Threads
property.description: This will add headings above sticky threads and above normal threads to clearly differentiate the two types of threads.

property.title: Side navigation animation
property.description: Adds an animation to side navigation items on page load

property.title: Sidebar widget animation
property.description: Adds an animation to sidebar widgets on page load

property.title: Height of the sticky navigation bar
Structured list horizontal padding
property.description: Sets the horizontal padding for list items such as discussion list, conversation list, reports list, etc..

property.title: Structured list vertical padding
property.description: Sets the vertical padding for list items such as discussion list, conversation list, reports list, etc..

property.title: Thread list separators
property.description: Styles the thread list separate when Separate Sticky Threads is enabled.

property.title: Viewport width to remove visitor tab text
property.description: Sets the minimum viewport width to display the conversations, alert and username text.

property.title: Minimum viewport width to show logo block
property.description: Viewport width to show the logo block. Below this width, the logo block will hide, and its components will be moved to the navigation

property.title: Viewport width to remove the sub-navigation
Visitor tabs location (mobile)
property.description: Choose where the visitor tabs should go for mobile
property.value_parameters: initial=Initial (don't change) tabbar= Tab bar canvas=Canvas

property.title: Welcome section location
property.description: Chooses where to insert the welcome section
property.value_parameters: aboveMainContainer=Default (above main container) mainContainerTop= Top of main container aboveMainContent=Above main content mainContentTop=Top of main content header=Bottom of header

property.title: Welcome section text
property.value: "Join this amazing group of people and start discussing what you like."
